info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 9 at 1:35PM CDT until July 9 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Austin/San Antonio TX
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of south central Texas, including the following county, Travis.
* WHEN...Until 445 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 135 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Austin, Round Rock, Pflugerville, Buda, Elgin, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Windemere, Tanglewood Forest, Manor, West Lake Hills, Rollingwood, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Bear Creek, Onion Creek, Barton Creek, Shady Hollow, Coupland, Hornsby Bend and Manchaca. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON
